errors.condition: This can occur when an update is requested for an enquiry reference that does not match any enquiry
errors.rationale: It is possible for the enquiry being passed in to be incorrect or corrupted.
errors.errorMessage: The enquiry you are updating does not exist. Please recheck the enquiry reference you provided is correct. The enquiry reference you provided was <XXXX>
errors.actionNeeded: Confirm that the enquiry reference is correct
